section.name: Info Element
section.p: The <info> element declares the resource group, name, optional version, and resource types.

tr.td: Declaration of the project group. <group>dpml/test</group> If the enclosing index declares a defining module then the module group will be used as the default group. If no module key is declared the group element must be included.

Declaration of the resource version. If undeclared, the default value is SNAPSHOT undes the system property ${dpml.release.signature} is declared in which case the value of ${dpml.release.signature} will be assigned as the project version. <version>1.1</version>
Declaration of the project type (may not be declared if the <types> element is used). If undeclared the 'jar' type is assumed. <type>plugin</type>
Declaration of multiple resource types produced by the project (may not be used in conjuction with the single <type> element declaration). <types> <type>jar</type> <type>part</type> </types>
